relation: Darrow2 - #59 The battle ends, but there's little reward for Ness. The hollow victory brings the realization of his failure to save Paula even with the Spook defeated.
Darrow2 - #60 As the sun sets, Ness finally breaks down and for the first time accepts that regardless of his power, he's just as much of a helpless boy as he is a hero.
Darrow2 - #61 Feeling homesick, Ness calls to check on his family. Fortunately, they bring him some much needed comfort.
Darrow2 - #62 The calm from Ness' call is short-lived as Jeff alerts him to another serious situation. Poor kid just can't catch a break, it seems.
Darrow2 - #63 Down, but not out quite yet, Everdred relays his tale to Ness and for the first time brings out the truth of the Mani Mani's power.
